mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "Square Dance Vacations - 1960", "Mountain Climbing", "Homes for Square Dancing", "Planning a Group Square Dance Trip", "To Answer Some Questions", "Convention Flashes", "Americana: Driftin' Down the Draw", "Still More About Contras", and "William A. (Billy) Foster". REGULAR FEATURES "Square Dance Picture", "Square Dance Date Book", "As I See It", "Style Series: The Grand Prowl", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor", "Caller of the Month: Les Houser", "Paging the Roundancers: Cliff and Flo Wick", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
